(usu. P and late) 2Ch 24:3 + 9 t.; n. om., = two things † Is 51:19, Job 13:20, Pr 30:7; [[שְׁתַּיִם]] = twice † 2Ki 6:10, Job 40:5, Ps 62:12 (or as Pr 30:7), ´[[בִּשׁ]]: Job 33:14 either so, or in two ways RVm (v. De); as ordin. [[בִּשְׁנַת שְׁתַּיִם לְ]] 1Ki 15:25 + 9 t., etc.; (3) as round number, [[שְׁנַיִם עֵחִים]] 1Ki 17:12 a few sticks (Germ. ‘ein paar’), cf. 2Ki 9:32, Is 17:6; [[שְׁתַּיִם שָׁלשׁ]] Am 4:8, [[פַּעַם וּשְׁתָָּיִם]] Ne 13:20, cf.
